attributes.action: Ask that retained firefighters have some form of warning road users when responding to there alerters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Being a retained firefighter is an essential in many areas, 
When your alerter goes off you could be up to 4 - 6 minutes away from the fire station.
Sometimes your held up because people do not realise you are responding to what could be a life critical incident.

I think that retained firefighters should have some form of emergency warning syestem to warn other road users that they are responding to emergency calls to make it so that the fire applicance leaves the station on time and continues to save lifes and not cause accidents responding to the the fire station
Even if it is just a red flashing light on top of the car, just some form of emergency warning to other road users
